message.content: I need to design a new microservice architecture

input.description: Design microservice architecture for scalable system
input.prompt: Design a comprehensive microservice architecture that follows best practices for scalability, maintainability, and security. Include service boundaries, communication patterns, and data flow.

content.content: I'll design a microservice architecture for your system. Let me start by analyzing the requirements and creating the service boundaries.

input.description: Implement the user service based on architectural design
input.prompt: Based on the architectural design, implement the user service with authentication, authorization, and user management capabilities. Use best practices for API design and data persistence.

content.content: I'll implement the user service with the following components: authentication middleware, user repository, and REST API endpoints.

input.description: Create comprehensive test suite for the user service
input.prompt: Write comprehensive tests for the user service including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests. Cover authentication flows, edge cases, and error handling.

content.content: I'll create a comprehensive test suite covering all aspects of the user service functionality.

input.prompt: Review the implemented services and optimize for performance and scalability. Focus on database queries, caching strategies, and async processing.

content.content: I'll optimize the backend for performance by implementing Redis caching, database indexing, and async processing patterns.
